b:with.b:if: [data-type="iconList"] .list.hasIcons . a {background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom, 0%, 100%)}[data-type="iconList"] .cloud.hasIcons . a:before {background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom, 0%, 100%)}[data-type="iconList"] .cloud.hasIcons . .icon-meta {color: }[data-type="iconList"] .list.hasIcons . a {background-color:}[data-type="iconList"] .cloud.hasIcons . a:before {background-color:}[data-type="iconList"] .cloud.hasIcons . .icon-meta {color: }

b:class.cond: data:view.isHomepage and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["sidebar-2","sidebar-3"]
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["sidebar-1","sidebar-3"]
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: not data:view.isHomepage and not data:view.isPost and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId == "sidebar-3"
b:class.name: noSide

b:if.cond: data:widget.sectionId in ["layout-1","layout-5"] and (data:content contains "slider-1" or data:content contains "slider-2" or data:content contains "slider-3" or data:content contains "slider-4" or data:content contains "slider-5" or data:content contains "grid-8")

b:elseif.cond: data:widget.sectionId in ["layout-2","layout-4"] and (data:content contains "slider-6" or data:content contains "slider-7" or data:content contains "grid-8")

data:widget.sectionId in ["layout-2","layout-4"] and (data:content contains "grid-1" or data:content contains "grid-2" or data:content contains "grid-3" or data:content contains "grid-4" or data:content contains "grid-5" or data:content contains "grid-6" or data:content contains "grid-7")

data:widget.sectionId in ["sidebar-1","sidebar-2","sidebar-3","footer-columns","canvas-2"] and (data:content contains "slider-8" or data:content contains "sided-1" or data:content contains "sided-2" or data:content contains "sided-3" or data:content contains "comments-1" or data:content contains "comments-2")

b:if.cond: data:link and data:link contains "{" and data:link contains "}"

b:attr.cond: data:widget.sectionId in ["sidebar-1","sidebar-2","sidebar-3"] and data:this.showFreqNumbers and data:this.display == "list"
b:attr.name: style

b:attr.cond: data:links all l => (l.name contains "[" and l.name contains "]" and l.name not contains "quote")
b:attr.name: data-type

b:attr.cond: data:links all l => (l.name contains "[" and l.name contains "]" and l.name contains "quote")
b:attr.name: data-type

b:if.cond: data:links all l => (l.name contains "[" and l.name contains "]")
data:links all l => (l.name contains "[" and l.name contains "]" and l.name not contains "quote")

b:elseif.cond: data:links all l => (l.name contains "[" and l.name contains "]" and l.name contains "quote")

b:if.cond: (data:defaultTitle or data:title) and data:widget.sectionId not in ["header-mainbar","header-childbar","footer-bottombar","sticky-list"] and (data:title not contains "[ad]") and (data:widget.type != "Adsense")
